alert.note: Alert for Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 4:55PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wyandotte, Leavenworth, northwestern Johnson and southeastern Platte Counties through 530 PM CST... At 454 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Williamstown to near Linwood to near De Soto. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leavenworth, Lansing, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Parkville, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edwardsville, Weatherby Lake, Kansas City, Lake Waukomis, Platte Woods, Linwood, Easton, Reno, Fairmount and Farley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 415. Interstate 29 between mile markers 6 and 8. Interstate 435 between mile markers 9 and 26. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 209 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
